TEXT.English: See Fashion House for details. Emperors Clothing is a rival of Fashion House, and thus requires many of the same resources.
TEXT.French: See Fashion House for details. Emperors Clothing is a rival of Fashion House, and thus requires many of the same resources.
TEXT.German: See Fashion House for details. Emperors Clothing is a rival of Fashion House, and thus requires many of the same resources.
TEXT.Italian: See Fashion House for details. Emperors Clothing is a rival of Fashion House, and thus requires many of the same resources.
TEXT.Spanish: See Fashion House for details. Emperors Clothing is a rival of Fashion House, and thus requires many of the same resources.

TEXT.English: Your local store to get your clothes.
TEXT.French: Your local store to get your clothes.
TEXT.German: Your local store to get your clothes.
TEXT.Italian: Your local store to get your clothes.
TEXT.Spanish: Your local store to get your clothes.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emperors Clothing[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emperors Clothing Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a culture bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emperors Clothing Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Emperors Clothing franchise.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emperors Clothing[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emperors Clothing Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a culture bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emperors Clothing Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Emperors Clothing franchise.
